 Description:

 Flashback HD - reissue of the classic adventure game Flashback, which was published more than 20 years ago. We have to go through the history of the Galactic Bureau of Investigation agent Conrad Hart , trying to stop the invasion of Earth by alien beings disguised as humans. Remake is based on modern graphics engine Unreal Engine 3, and differs from the original , not only graphical performance, but also advanced animation.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features Repack: 

 Do not cut / recoded
 Unlocked access to the 1993 version of the game menu
 Ability to select a combination of text and voice
